reviewText: One of my favorite shows ever.  Watched when it first came out and love it more now.  Gemma Jones is a great actress.  The series managed to take the viewer through numerous ups and downs in the main character's life without being soap operish.  No matter how many times I watch it, I still find myself getting emotionally involved with the characters.  Christopher Casenove is wonderful, as are the other actors in the regular cast.

I love this series. HOWEVER, Amazon must have just posted that this won't play in the US DVD players. This was received as a gift & that was not stated when ordered. Yet , it will play in the computer.
Wrong zone -won't work in DVD player
Love this series!  It is a wonderful walk through the past.  I love the Edwardian period.  The clothes the decorations, everything.
